attributes.action: Promote General Sir Richard Dannatt upon his retirement
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
General Sir Richard Dannatt has been an outspoken critic on soldiers pay and conditions and has given his country almost 40 years of service.

It is for this reason that he, one of the greatest military leaders of the governments recent wars, should be recommended to the Queen for promotion to the rank of Field Marshal. 

This would show the governments, and the British peoples appreciation for him, and all of the soldiers he leads and represents.

rejection.details: Sorry for the late response, however we must reject your petition as it is outside the remit of the PM.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
